definition: remnants of material from an industrial process/offcut/scraps
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks

sentences.english: She has built these scraps of metal into a sculpture.
sentences.chinese: 她把這些金屬下腳料製成一尊雕刻品。

sentences.english: She bought some timber off-cuts to build kitchen shelves.
sentences.chinese: 她買了一些木材下腳料做廚房用架子。

sentences.english: Of course, it's always a good idea to practice on some scrap wood first.
sentences.chinese: 當然，最好還是在下腳料上先練習練習。

sentences.english: You will find the true value of using waste.
sentences.chinese: 你會發現使用下腳料的真正價值。

sentences.english: Waste, parings and scrap, of plastics.
sentences.chinese: 塑料的廢碎料及下腳料。

sentences.english: This Japanese factory always buy's leftover bits, and pieces to produce its products.
sentences.chinese: 日本工廠總是購買下腳料來進行生產。
